Case details

This case involves the theft of valuable items from a retail store in London. The incident occurred on 28 April 2023 at approximately 15:30. CCTV footage has captured the suspect, and there are witness statements from store employees.

The suspect was apprehended by police shortly after leaving the premises. Stolen merchandise valued at approximately £450 was recovered. The case is currently active with charges being prepared.

Suspect information

  • Name: James Wilson
  • Age: 32
  • Previous offenses: None on record
  • Current status: Released on bail

  • Review case
  • View materials

1 May 2023 - Initial case documentation received.

Case review: 25 May 2023

Court hearing: 15 June 2023
